description: CI/CD Pipeline Fixes & Production Issue Analysis
releaseNotes: CI/CD pipeline stability improvements and production issue diagnostics: (1) Fixed GitHub Actions CI/CD frontend ESLint interactive prompt blocking builds; (2) Enhanced frontend linting workflow with Next.js build directory creation; (3) Added comprehensive production issue analysis for pricing.monthlyTwd error in docs/issues/; (4) Identified and documented root cause of frontend crashes due to missing pricing field in fallback plan configurations; (5) Provided immediate and long-term fix strategies for production billing page errors; (6) Updated CI workflow to use 'npx next lint --fix' for non-interactive execution; (7) Improved error handling and debugging documentation for dev vs production differences. All changes maintain backward compatibility while enhancing system reliability and developer experience.
author: Coachly Team
